doc.title: Bike Kill
doc.plot: Each year the Black Label Bicycle Club gather from all over America to their annual BIKE KILL event on Halloween in a tiny, dead end street in deepest Brooklyn. This film is the documentation of events of that day which include: Six pack attack, Dirty mattress, Bumper tanks, Tandem bike backseat pi√±ata smasher, Tall bike jousting and the secret event of the evening, JET BIKE.
